title: Einstein and the Bomb
short_cast: Aidan McArdle, Andrew Havill, Rachel Barry, Helena Westerman, Leo Ashizawa, Jay Lewis Mitchell, Simon Markey, James Musgrave, Simon Haines
cast: Aidan McArdle, Andrew Havill, Rachel Barry, Helena Westerman, Leo Ashizawa, Jay Lewis Mitchell, Simon Markey, James Musgrave, Simon Haines
genre: British, Documentaries, Historical Documentaries, Military Movies, Drama Movies, Science & Nature Docs, Biographical Documentaries, Military Documentaries, Docudramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: What happened after Einstein fled Nazi Germany? Using archival footage and his own words, this docudrama dives into the mind of a tortured genius.
